doc.title: The First Blogger Blood Donation Drive attracted 150 bloggers!
doc.text: Congratulations/JJ to/TO Nuffnang/VB Singapore/NN for/IN successfully/NN organizing/IN the/DT very/RB first/JJ blogger/NNP blood/NNP donation/NNP drive/NNP on/IN Saturday/NNP ,/, 29th/NNP November/NNP !/. A/DT total/NN of/IN 150/NNP intrepid/NNP bloggers/NNP turned/VBD up/RP for/IN the/DT event/NN to/TO do/VB their/PRP$ bit/NN for/IN the/DT blood/NN bank/NN ./. I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ some/NN must/RB have/VBN been/VBN fighting/VBG belonephobia/NNP -LRB-/NNP fear/NN of/IN needles/NN -RRB-/NN ,/, but/CC in/IN the/DT end/NN ,/, it/PRP was/VBD the/DT combination/NN of/IN friendship/NN and/CC an/DT atmosphere/NN of/IN fun/NN which/WDT helped/VB them/PRP get/VB over/IN the/DT fear/NN ./. Besides/JJ ,/, it/PRP was/VBD a/DT great/JJ way/NN to/TO make/VB new/JJ friends/NNS and/CC of/IN course/NN there/RB was/VBD lots/RB of/IN food/NN as/IN well/RB ./. If/IN you/PRP have/VBP missed/VBN this/DT blood/JJ donation/NN drive/NN ,/, do/VBP n't/RB worry/JJ ,/, as/IN I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ there/RB will/VB be/VB a/DT sequel/JJ some/JJ time/NN in/IN the/DT future/NN ./.
